sentence: The six-term congressman from Amish Country exits a primary race in northeast Ohio that, under new temporary maps, would have put him up against Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.
author: JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Ohio Rep. Bob Gibbs retires abruptly, blames fight over maps

title: Trump returning to Ohio for GOP rally ahead of May 3 primary
